languages.text: "Ммм. Полагаю, поддал{mf|ся|ась} соблазну момента? Тебе стоит лучше обдумывать свои действия, {name}".
"Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Ммм. Полагаю, поддал{mf|ся|ась} соблазну момента? Тебе стоит лучше обдумывать свои действия, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm. Así que fue una decisión impulsiva. Te dejaste llevar por la tentación, ¿verdad? Deberías pensar más tus acciones, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm. Así que fue una decisión impulsiva. Te dejaste llevar por la tentación, ¿verdad? Deberías pensar más tus acciones, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嗯，我猜是一时冲动的决定。你当时肯定是一时兴起，没错吧？你真该更谨慎地做决定才是，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我猜是一时冲动的决定。你当时肯定是一时兴起，没错吧？你真该更谨慎地做决定才是，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「うーん。とっさに出した決断だったんじゃないか。誘惑に負けた、そうだろう？もっと慎重に考えてから行動すべきだったな、{name}」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「うーん。とっさに出した決断だったんじゃないか。誘惑に負けた、そうだろう？もっと慎重に考えてから行動すべきだったな、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... Moi, je crois plutôt que vous avez agi sur un coup de tête. Vous n'avez pas pu résister à la tentation, n'est-ce pas ? À l'avenir, vous devriez y réfléchir à deux fois avant de prendre des risques inconsidérés, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Moi, je crois plutôt que vous avez agi sur un coup de tête. Vous n'avez pas pu résister à la tentation, n'est-ce pas ? À l'avenir, vous devriez y réfléchir à deux fois avant de prendre des risques inconsidérés, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm. Eine spontane Entscheidung, scheint mir. Die Versuchung war wohl einfach zu groß, was? Ihr solltet Euch besser überlegen, was Ihr tut, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Eine spontane Entscheidung, scheint mir. Die Versuchung war wohl einfach zu groß, was? Ihr solltet Euch besser überlegen, was Ihr tut, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, ."

languages.text: "Hımm, o anda aklına esti herhâlde. Dürtülerine engel olamadın, değil mi? Daha usturuplu hamleler yapman lazım {name}."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. A spur-of-the-moment decision, I think. Temptation got the better of you, did it? You ought to consider your actions more carefully, {name}."
